original_text: There were white cotton curtains and violet hangings fastened with cords of fine linen and purple to silver rods and marble pillars, and also couches of gold and silver on a mosaic pavement of porphyry, marble, mother-of-pearl, and precious stones.
korean_text: 백색, 녹색, 청색 휘장을 자색 가는 베 줄로 대리석 기둥 은고리에 매고 금과 은으로 만든 걸상을 화반석, 백석, 운모석, 흑석을 깐 땅에 진설하고

sentences.original_text: fastened with cords of fine linen and purple
sentences.korean_translation: 고급 린넨과 보라색 끈으로 묶여 있었으며

sentences.original_text: to silver rods and marble pillars
sentences.korean_translation: 은 막대와 대리석 기둥에 매달려 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and also couches of gold and silver
of porphyry, marble, mother-of-pearl, and precious stones
sentences.korean_translation: 반정석, 대리석, 진주 패괘, 그리고 귀한 돌로 만들어졌습니다
